I posted a reply to Tiffany's comment on Saitou and the detention 
center and it's yet to show up, almost two hours later, but a new 
message from her has shown up on the list site.  Just seeing how long 
it takes for this to show up.  (Still no response from Yahoo to my 
query... grrr.)

phil
